channel.title: Need Help With This Error
channel.description:
ok recently i have gotton this error
[code]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting Rs2armor Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:311) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) [/code]
well i searched around and heard resarting fixes well i did bout 8 time
and when i try to log on it goes to a black screen and just stays like that

item.title: Need Help With This Error
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

No theirs a misconseption in your itemhandler on line (39 and 311) probably the load item.cfg method so go into your item.cfg and look for and spaces their can only be tabs.

go into your itemhandler.java type CTR+g then type 39 and post whats on that line here.

Read full topic
